fields.name: Required own cookies
fields.description: This cookies are required for the website.

fields.name: Google
fields.description: Google cookies make your online experience easier by saving browsing information

fields.name: Facebook
fields.description: Facebook uses cookies to know who you are in order to work properly.

fields.name: arp_scroll_position
fields.description: Stores the scroll position of the page when the user has scrolled to the bottom of the page.

fields.name: sessionid
fields.description: Stores the session ID, which is used to uniquely identify your session.

fields.name: csrftoken
fields.description: Stores the CSRF token of the user to provide protection against Cross Site Request Forgeries. More information about Cross Site Request Forgeries: https://www.squarefree.com/securitytips/web-developers.html#CSRF
More information about how Google uses cookies: https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies
